Second sem mai tu patla hogya tha aur tune beard bhi theek kr li thi to tb student dikhne laggya tha. 
Bhai maaf kr dena ye tera uncle nickname maine hi phelaya tha shayad! 
Aur phr jb tu weekends pe subah library chala jaata tha aur raat ko aata tha first year mai, to tere side waale laundo ki bhut phat jaati thi aur bacche Deepak Shubham waale kamre mai aake teri kahania sunaya krte the ki bhai Aayush Sharma subah library chala jaata hai aur raat ko aata hai. Tbse humaari dosti hogyi thi aur dheere dheere jb majak kra shuru kia humne aapas mai tb realise hua ki tu mst bnda hai. First year kitna chill tha yar second ke comparison mai.

Kya khana tha yar BBQ ka. Tere birthday pe jo cake kaaata tha vaha, vo khaya nhi gaya to room pe laake shaam ko khaya maine ğŸ˜‚ ğŸ˜‚ 
Bhai kisse to aur bhi bhut saare hai aur kuch itne masaledaar ki mai yaha likh nhi sakta ğŸ˜‚ ğŸ˜‚. Jo college mai saath time spend kia bhut hi mst gujra bro. Last year pandemic ki vjeh se college mai spend nhi kr paae lekin 2nd and 3rd year humesha yaad rahega. They were the best times. 
Bhai jtna time humne college mai saath spend kia, mst raha. Pandemic ki wajah se thoda cut short hogya vrna hum in 1.5 saal pr koi nhi ab jb milenge, tb msti hogi.  
Mst perform krna bhai corporate mai, humesha confidence rakhna khud pe. Self confidence kabhi kbhi humaara doubt ho jaata hai but kbhi apne pe doubt mt krna. Baaki mehnat to tu kr hi leta hai vha jaha financial motive hota hai ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ Jaise intern/ placement mai chaapa hai vaise hi machana bahar bhi. Audi kharidne ka sapna bhi pura ho jaaega tera aur jo chahiye baaki vo sb bhi kar hi lega tu. 
Kuch bhi hojaae aise hi chill rehna bhai. Khil khilate rehna aur msti krna. I wish you great success, fulfilment, prosperity, relationships (if you know what I meanğŸ˜œ), and everything you want in life bhai. 
At last, thank you for everything bro. I am really grateful that our paths crossed, and we became friends. Stay happy and healthy. Stay in touch!!!

Summer camp mai kaafibaar mai tumhare room mai aaya krta tha gappe maarne. Rajan to khair jb bhi mai aata tha, Naruto hi dekhta rehta thaÂ  Â Teri aur meri kaafi baat ho jaati thi. Summer camp se mst time nhi dekha bhai life mai. Khelo, khao and sojao. Aur zindagi mai vaise bhi chahiye hi kya hota hai yarÂ  Â Isse better life nhi hogi kbhi bhi.

Hum raat ko after dinner kaafi baar walks pe bhi jaate the yar, vo pure din mai se mujhe best activity lagti thi. Pehle pehle hum 2 hi hote the, baad mai Shubham bhi aane lg gya. Walking ke baad mn ki tension bhi saari nikal jaati thi. Kuch baar aise hi hum OAT mai bhi baithte the raat to Kathi roll leke. Kbhi hum 2, kbhi saath mai Rajan and divyanshu bhi. Bhai mst time tha yar vo. Un time mujhe lagta tha ki yehi pal yaad aaenge baad maiÂ  Â Walk krte hue, late night cycling pee ya OAT mai, aisa lagta tha bhai ki humaari sari IITK ki problems thode time ke lie pause ho jaati thi and we would enjoy thoroughly, humari gappe jo itni rangeeli hua krti thiÂ  Â

I am very happy for you. Antragini ke waqt hum 2 3 baje tk ghumte the, walks krte rehte the, kbhi events ground mai kuch khalete the thode photos kheech lete the, life mai chill krna us time kitna simple tha yar. Koi mask, sanitiser ki jaroorat nhi aur hum sb bhi saath mai. Antragini ke 4 din, ye yaaad nhi aata tha ki Monday ko assignment dene hai and quizzes haiÂ  Â  Â  


Second year ka jo summer tha yar vo bhi bhut mst gujra. Again we were roomies so it was awesome and phr hum swimming bhi jaaya krte the kbhi subah kbhi shaam. Un dino bhut maja aata tha. Ab to swimming pool bhi nhi milna aur mil bhi jaae to pandemic khatm hone tk bnd hi rahega Â Bhai mai IIT se bahar kisi aur college ke bndo se is baare mai baat krta tha, unhe yakeen hi nhi hota tha humaare college mai swimming pool tha Â Vo bhi olympic size Unki aankhein bahar aa jaati thi sunke. Second year ka summer meri life ka kaafi defining time bhi raha yar.Â  Around 25th May I wrote my first song in that top-floor scorching hot room of ours. Us din se mujhe kaafi jaada clarity aai and unlike the first two years at college when I was uncertain about a career path, 3rd and 4th year mai mujhe further realise hua ki mujhe music artist hi bnna hai and this is the road I wanna take.
Third year ek romaanch ke sath start start hua.Â  Ghamasaan baarish mai hum intern interviews ke lie formals lene big bazaar gye the bheegte hueÂ  Â  Â  Bhai vo baarish jaise humaari intern ki problems ke start hone ka symbol thi .

Maine socha tha ki fourth year mai hum bhut chill maarenge, parties krenge, bulla kaatenge, finally lucknow and agra bhi ghum aaenge aur kya pata Goa bhi, fests mai jm ke naachenge but none of it was in our destiny. But all in all, mai ye sb islie mention krra hu because bhale hi humaara saath rehne ka time cut short hogya, I am still very grateful for the time we got to spend together in college. Intern season kaafi tough tha yar, kaafi time tk mujhe lagra tha pata nhi lagegi ya nhi. Kher baad me lg hi gyi thi. Placements mai to maineÂ  kuch tests dene ke baad chod dia tha tests dena.Bhai I am so happy ki tera placement lg gya akhir kaar. Tune kaafi sacrifices bhi kie and un sbka phl tujhe ultimately mil hi gya bhai.Â  Congrats again.


Bhai before concluding, mai tujhe bs ek baat ye kehna chahunga ki jaise intern and placements humaare lie life ke bhut hi crucial opportunities thi, aise hi life mai aage bhi kai make it or break it waali opportunities aati rahengi and unlike intern and placements, tu try krna pehle se clarity attain krne ki ki tujhe ye opportunities chahiye ki nhi and if chahiye to unse tujhe kya chahiye. Mujhe kaafi bura laga tere lie ki tujhe placements ke lie prepare krne ka sahi se time nhi mil paaya kyunki jb test start hogye the tb bhut pressure aa jaata hai. But still, you prevailed because of your will and work and I salute you for that!


Tujhe 4 saal jaana and kaafi time saath mai bitaya to kaafi accha laga bro. You have an indomitable spirit, kabhi haar nhi maanta , humesha mehnat krta hai irrespective of repeated failures or stress and pressure . Is chakkar mai tera grade point bhi eventually kaafi accha aane laga and CPI pe bhi accha prabhav pada. Bhai life mai bhi same isi attitude se aage bdna. CorporateÂ  ko bhi isi sincere and learning attitude se approach krna and I am sure ki tera rising curve steep rahega 

Baaki agar tera abhi bhi Europe se MTech ya MS krne ka mn hai to jaroor krna bro. Terko prof bnna hai to vo hi krna, core mai kaam krna hai to vo krna and agar ab non core mai job pasand aa ajae to yehi field mai job krna. Tu jo krna chahta hai, krna. Apna attitude aisa hi rakhega to hr jagah safal hoga bro. Bs ek request hai ki pehle acche se clarity le lena kyunki tera mind kai baar logo ki baato se divert ho jaata, which is fine. Sometimes, in turmoil, its hard to differentiate your own voice from others. Mere saath bhi kai baar hua hai.Â  Aisa kbhi lage ki tujhe kya krna hai samjh naa aae to take a step away from everyone and collect your own thoughts.


Baaki khub ishq krna bhai. Tere jaisa optimist-romantic maine life mai kbhi nhi dekha and mujhe lagta bhi nhi kbhi dekhunga. I think it takes a lot of courage to put your heart out there everyday even though it might get hurt and isilie hr koi tere jaisa nhi hota. I wish you all the love in the world brotherÂ  . Stay happy and healthy, and stay in touch!!!

text:
Hello Arya! Kaisa hai bhai?
Humaara sbse pehla interaction hua tha, at the start of second year jb Kushlam and P.Singh ne guidance ke lie saare Hall 3 MTH Y17 ko gather kia tha reading room mai.  Yaad hai jb  P.Singh ne kaha tha ki logic mai thodi mehnat krni padegi but Linear Algebra to chill hai ğŸ˜‚ ğŸ˜‚ ğŸ˜‚. Bhai us din humme se kisine ye nhi socha tha ki humne Linear Algebra ko kitna underestimate kia hai aur uske aane waale mahino mai kya consequences honge. Aur phr fourth sem to aur bhi khatarnaak. With Abstract Algebra and the Harry Potter Prof lol. Mujhe yaad hai Abstract algebra mai kaisi mari rehti thi humaari. Hum kitne masoom the yar jo Linear Algebra ko tough samajhte the ğŸ˜‚ Koi nhi. Ab every such course that we did is in the past.
Second year mai humaari satti community academically bhut miserable haalat mai thi yar. But towards the end of it, jo hum sabne forces jode and we became like Allied Powers, uski vajah se humaari 4 saal ki degree kaafi acche performance se saath gujar gyi. Iski vajah se humaari  dosti bhi acchi hogyi aur humaara itna accha friend circle bhi bn gya. Humaara satti group me sb bnde itne mast jo hai yar. 
Vo har mth ke paper se pehle, library mai 1 table pe saath baith kr assignment krna, kbhi Santhanam ke, kbhi complex ke, kbhi stochastic ke, ek doosre ke doubts clear krna bhut yaad aaegaa yar. Us time hamari sbki phatti to rehti thi ki 1  ghante baad paper hai lekin un times pe hum sbse jaada close the and we were all helping each other through. Bhai mai bhut lucky tha jo mujhe ye group mil gya sahi mai. 

Bhai kaafi baar mai MTH ko lekar kaafi pareshan rehta tha yar, lekin jb bhi tujhse baat krta tha, kaafi accha lagta tha. Tu humesha console krta  tha ki bhai pd le, assignment kr lenge saath mai, ho jaaega. 3rd and 4th year, when I was having trouble committing to acads, tb bhi tune kaafi help ki yar. 
Specially bhai in Time Series. Bhai us din tune group project mai bacha lia bs, thank you so much for that. Mai bhut careless tha yar, merko aakhri din yaad aaya ki group bhi dhunda hai aur project bhi bnana hai. Bhai mujhe yaad hai, 12 bje project submission ki deadline thi aur maine tujhe raat 8 bje call kia tha ki apne group mai rakh le. 
Bhai mujhe yakeen nhi hota ki tune itni aasani se mujhe include kr lia group mai. Mujhe aaj tk samajh nhi aata ki tune mujhe apne group mai add kyu kia, even after I asked you on the last day jb tum log project bna chuke the and maine itni kaamchori ki thi ki mai 1 group bhi nhi dhund paaya tha. But bhai thank you so much yar. Really. 
You are a genuinely good person bro. I am so grateful that we became friends. Jb hum saath parties mai jaate the, bhut majaa aata tha. Jaise Shrotriyaâ€™s 18th birthday in CCD, the BBQ party, the pizza party in Urban Clave and the party in Hall 10 canteen. Jitna time humne college mai saath spend kia, mst raha. Pandemic ki wajah se thoda cut short hogya vrna hum in 1.5 saal mai kaafi aur parties krte aur kaafi last moment group studies in library bhi. Koi nhi ab jb milenge, tb mst party karenge phrse. 
Bhai, I think you will do great in your career. Vaise bhi humaare group mai, applied maths mai sbse accha tu hi perform krta hai, ye maine Prob Stats se hi observe kr lia tha. Bhai finance mai tujhe interest hai, bhut rise krega tu and bhut jaada paisa kamaega. Khub mehnat krna bro, jo chahiye vo achieve krna. I wish you great success, fulfilment, South Bombay mai 1 ghar, and everything you want in life.  
At last, thank you for everything bro. I am really grateful that our paths crossed in these four years and that we became friends. Stay healthy and happy bro. Take care!

P.S. Tu bhut smart hai bhai, maintain rakhna humesha khudko. Tond mt aane dena!!!

text:
Hello Shrey bhai! Kaisa hai yar??

Bhai humaari aise regularly kbhi baat nhi hui but jb bhi tu milta tha bhut accha lagta tha yar. Humne 4 saal mai kaja mile waha hasi majaak kia.

Tu bhai 12th ke beech mai Maths mai switch krke IIT aaya, bhai I salute you for it and I am always in awe jb merko ye yaad aati hai ki tu jee mai 700 rank laaya tha ye sb krke bhi. Bhai is baat mai koi shk nhi ki tu chaapu hai, tha aur rahega. Bhai tera physics mai itna interest tha ki tune uske lie Medical se IIT mai apna aim switch kr lia. Tera PhD and research ka man hai, jaroor krna bhai. Ab dual degree mai mst mehnat krna bhai. Bhai mujhe yakeen hai ki tu aage jaake bhut successful hoga life mai. Bhale hi abhi aisa exactly obvious na lgra ho, aur terko pichle 2 3 saal ki performance se thoda inconfident feel hora ho but bhai tu apne pe bharosa krna kbhi mt chodna yar. You just keep going bro. Stephen Hawkings ka bachlors performance kaafi ghatiya tha bhai and he is one of the most remarkable physicists till date. Bhai tune apni life physics ko dedicate krne ki sochi hai,  jaroor krna bhai.

Bhai tu HSS ka bhut hi integral part raha since the first year, in fact you led HSS. Bhai Hindi ke prati jo tera passion hai usko humesha kaayam rakhna and humesha creativity apni engage rehna. Apne creative talent ko waste mt jaane dena please. Mujhe aisa lgta hai ki HSS ne tujhe ek platform dia in 4 years mai which helped you create your identlity, your confidence and your overall personality. Bhai usne tujhe family dee hai. Us family ko bacha ke rakhna bhai and HSS ne jo tujhme aisi aag jalai hai usse kbhi bujhne mt dena. 

Life mai kai baar tu akela hoga and ek dusre se itna contact na hora ho kya pata but apni self worth kbhi mt bhulna bro. Tu heera hai, heera heera hi rehta hai, dhul lag jaae to koila nhi bn jaaeta. Keep gong on your path bhai, mujhe pata hai ki tujhe in 4 saalo mai bhut baar aisa laga ki tera jo physics ka interest tha vo tu kisi prof ko convey jada acche se nhi kr paaya and you couldnâ€™t find exactly the support you wanted for Physics but koi nhi bhai lage rehna and I am sure youâ€™ll find it eventually. Abhi naa shi to PhD mai.

Bhai tu bhut hi shi bnda hai and I love you. Bhai tera sleep cycle yaad krke and jokes vgera yaad krke mai jindagi bhar hasa krungağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Fourth year mai jo hume 50 days ke lie college vaaps aane ka mauka mila usme hum 3 4 baar mile, mujhe bhut accha laga bhai I am very grateful and lucky bro ki in 4 saalo mai merko tera dost bnne ka mauka mila. 

Tu kbhi doosre kya sochenge, irrespective of that humesha apna asli opinion bolta hai and I respect you for that bro. Kbhi change mt hona bro, aise hi chill rehna always!  Mess mai humaara saath meal krna humesha yaad aaega bhai. Hum dono ka connection bhut hi mst tha shuru se!

Baaki I wish you great success, prosperity and fulfilment in life bhai, meri ye kaamna hai ki tu khub aage jaae life mai aur apna full potential achieve kre. 

Take care bro. Stay happy and healthy. 

Till next timeğŸ‘‹ğŸ‘‹ğŸ‘‹

 Jb events ground mn bhar jaata tha humaara tb tu kai baar kehta tha bhaio chalo yar, ghumne hi chalte hai, walk lete hai lmbi. Us time aisa lgra tha jaise koi Netflix show dekhre ho humğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚, ki unki duniya mai virus aagya koi. Hum chill the. Aur phr 7th, 8th sem online. 

Khair 4th year mai un college ke 2 mahino ke alawa milna to hua nhi lekin ghr pe rehte rehte humne khub baatein kr li thi, hr 20 25 din mai 2 3 ghante raat ko baat krte the call pe, pure 20 din ka cover ho jaata tha ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚Terse baat krta tha to bhut accha lagta tha bhai. Mere ghar waale to convince hogye the ek time pe ki meri girlfriend hai ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ Yaad hai bhai tujhe humne kaise umeed hi chod di thi college khulne ki. Mtlb ek chamtkaar hi tha ki March April mai college khul gya, kaafi accha raha bhai. 50 din college mai saath rahe hall 9 mai. Photography, holi, night walks, sb bhut mst raha. In 50 days ne jaise humaare 4 saal ke stay ko acche se conclude kr dia.

Bhai ab college khtm hogya hai and dekha jaae to now we are free. Tere aur mere bhut hi bold sapne hai bhai, aise sapne kisi aur ke kbhi nhi dekhe maine. Mujhe mst artist bnna hai bhai, world class ekdum. Bhut mehnat krunga mai, saalo laga dunga. Tu bhi apna sahi se figure out krle bhai 2 3 saal jitne bhi lage. Ek doosre se vaada hai bhai, khwaab pure krenge. Agar koi bhi succesful na hua hummne ya bs koi 1 hua to maja utna nhi aaega. Dono agar hum jo sochte hai goals apne, vo achieve kr lenge bhai to bhut maja aane waala hai life mai. Fourth year mai jb ye pata chal ki tere papa guzar gye to bhut shock laga bhai. Kaafi sudden tha. My condolences. Uncle ki aatma ki shanti ki kaamna krta hu.Tune kaafi accha cope kia and apni mummy aur bhai ka bhi khayal rakha through this time. 

Baaki last mai yehi kahunga ki tu bhut mst bnda hai bhai, tere saath jo pal beete in 4 years mai vo humesha yaad rahenge. Tu kbhi stress nhi leta hai jaada, stressful situations mai apni performance kharab nhi hone deta, and jo kaam krta hai mn se interest leke krta hai. Tera attitude and approach towards life mere lie humesha inspiring rahega. Thankyou for everything bro. I am very lucky and grateful ki tu aur mai first year se hi itne close rahe, acche friends bne and itna mst time beeta saath. Khub chill marna yar ghar mai, dual kraega to kra lena and is baar GATE bhi dena hai tune, uske lie bhi all the best! Mst prepare kr lena bhai is baar, kaafi time hai aur kher tune aero dept ka seriously pada hi hai to uska kaafi advantage hai. Corona ka prakop thoda km ho to bhai phr milte hai, vaise bhi hum to mai Delhi shift hogya huğŸ˜„. 

Stay healthy and stay happy bro. Call pe baat krte rahenge!

Untill next time!ğŸ‘‹ğŸ‘‹

Thank you for all the experiences we lived together bhai. It has been so much fun to know you. You are a genuinely good person. P.S. PhD aur research krne ka sapna kabhi mt chorna bro. Bhale hi due to pandemic, situation thodi tough hogyi hai but never give up on your dreams, ever.
